content.question: Object <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> of mass <math alttext="4 kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> travels with a speed of <math alttext="3 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mtext> </mtext><mfrac><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> toward object <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> of mass <math alttext="2 kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> that is initially at rest. Object <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> then collides with and sticks to object <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. After the collision, object <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and object <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> remain stuck together. How much mechanical energy is converted into nonmechanical energy during the collision?

choices.label: <math alttext="10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>J</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
